article.title: Boeing Awarded Wideband Satellite Communications Contract
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Boeing Satellite Systems Incorporated, El Segundo, California, is being awarded a $21 million firm-fixed-price contract for the Wideband Global SATCOM 7 & Beyond contract issued to purchase parts for SV10.Â Headquarters, Space and Missile Systems Center, El Segundo, California, is the contracting activity.
